text: aur ek momin shaqs ne jo feraun ke khandaan mein se tha aur apna imaan chupaaye hoye tha, kaha ke kya tum ek shaqs ko mahez is baath par qatl karte ho, ke wo kehta hai ke mera rab Allah hai aur tumhaare rab ki taraf se dalile le kar aaya hai, agar wo jhuta ho, to us ka jhot osi par hai aur agar wo saccha ho to, jis (azaab) ka wo tum se waada kar raha hai, us mein se kuch na kuch to tum par aa padega, Allah taâ€™ala us ki rehbari nahi karta, jo hadh se guzar jaane waale aur jhute ho
